name: Candy Burst
description:
Are you a big fan of sweet candy puzzle game? Just clear the candies by popping two or more connected candies of the same color to blast. It seems easy to play, but it will be amazingly fun and challenging to achieve the master level. There are splendid new candies and booster are waiting for you to explore.

Features:
- Over 240 pleasantly yummy puzzle levels
- Challenging obstacles: Fruit jelly, Cookie, Chocolate, etc.
- Collect lollipops and cookies for the tricky levels
- 5 different chapters and sweet stories: Cream Garden, Honey Pools, Cotton Isle, Candy Shores and Choco Forest
- Beautiful and tempting candy design with magic glamour
- Addictive gameplay. 
- Play anywhere & anytime

Use your matching skill to journey the exciting candy adventure!
